title: Induced metric of a normed complex vector space

blocks.name: imsval
blocks.content: Value of the induced metric of a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm imsval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wceq(c1, ccom(c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cnsb, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cims, c0))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(c1, ccom(c2, c3), cfv(cims, c0), ccom(cfv(cnmcv, c0), cfv(cnsb, c0)), wcel(c0, cnv))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cnv, cims, ccom(cfv(cnmcv, c0), cfv(cnsb, c0)), ccom(cfv(cnmcv, cv(hs0)), cfv(cnsb, cv(hs0))))
  coeq12d(cfv(cnmcv, cv(hs0)), cfv(cnsb, cv(hs0)), cfv(cnmcv, c0), cfv(cnsb, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cnmcv)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cnsb)
  df-ims(hs0)
  coex(cfv(cnmcv, c0), cfv(cnsb, c0))
  fvex(cnmcv, c0)
  fvex(cnsb, c0)
  coeq12i(c2, c3, cfv(cnmcv, c0), cfv(cnsb, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cnv)
  diff.hs0.c(ccom(cfv(cnmcv, c0), cfv(cnsb, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm imsval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 =(c2 ∘ c3))
  ⊣ c3 =(-v ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(normCV ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(IndMet ` c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(c1, (c2 ∘ c3), (IndMet ` c0), ((normCV ` c0)∘(-v ` c0)), c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cnv, cims, ((normCV ` c0)∘(-v ` c0)), ((normCV ` hs0)∘(-v ` hs0)))
  coeq12d((normCV ` hs0), (-v ` hs0), (normCV ` c0), (-v ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cnmcv)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cnsb)
  df-ims(hs0)
  coex((normCV ` c0), (-v ` c0))
  fvex(cnmcv, c0)
  fvex(cnsb, c0)
  coeq12i(c2, c3, (normCV ` c0), (-v ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cnv)
  diff.hs0.c(((normCV ` c0)∘(-v ` c0)))
}

blocks.name: imsdval
blocks.content: Value of the induced metric (distance function) of a normed complex vector space. Equation 1 of [Kreyszig] p. 59. (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm imsdval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), cfv(c5, co(c1, c6, c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cnsb, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cims, c0))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(co(c1, c4, c3), cfv(c5, co(c1, c6, c3)), cfv(c4, cop(c1, c3)), cfv(c5, cfv(c6, cop(c1, c3))), w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  eqtrd(cfv(c4, cop(c1, c3)), cfv(c5, cfv(c6, cop(c1, c3))), cfv(ccom(c5, c6), cop(c1, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  fveq1d(c4, cop(c1, c3), ccom(c5, c6), w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(c4, ccom(c5, c6)))
  imsval(c0, c4, c5, c6)
  3impb(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cfv(ccom(c5, c6), cop(c1, c3)), cfv(c5, cfv(c6, cop(c1, c3)))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cnv), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c5, c6), cop(c1, c3)), cfv(c5, cfv(c6, cop(c1, c3)))), wf(c6, cxp(c2, c2), c2), wcel(cop(c1, c3), cxp(c2, c2)))
  nvmf(c0, c6, c2)
  opelxpi(c1, c2, c3, c2)
  fvco3(c6, cxp(c2, c2), c2, cop(c1, c3), c5)
  df-ov(c1, c4, c3)
  fveq2i(c5, co(c1, c6, c3), cfv(c6, cop(c1, c3)))
  df-ov(c1, c6, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm imsdval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c4]c3)=(c5 `(c1[c6]c3)))
  ⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(-v ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(normCV ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(IndMet ` c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g((c1[c4]c3), (c5 `(c1[c6]c3)), (c4 ` < c1, c3 >), (c5 `(c6 ` < c1, c3 >)), (c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  eqtrd((c4 ` < c1, c3 >), (c5 `(c6 ` < c1, c3 >)), ((c5 ∘ c6)` < c1, c3 >), (c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  fveq1d(c4, < c1, c3 >, (c5 ∘ c6), (c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 =(c5 ∘ c6))
  imsval(c0, c4, c5, c6)
  3impb(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, ((c5 ∘ c6)` < c1, c3 >)=(c5 `(c6 ` < c1, c3 >)))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), ((c5 ∘ c6)` < c1, c3 >)=(c5 `(c6 ` < c1, c3 >)), (c6 :(c2 × c2)→ c2), < c1, c3 > ∈(c2 × c2))
  nvmf(c0, c6, c2)
  opelxpi(c1, c2, c3, c2)
  fvco3(c6, (c2 × c2), c2, < c1, c3 >, c5)
  df-ov(c1, c4, c3)
  fveq2i(c5, (c1[c6]c3), (c6 ` < c1, c3 >))
  df-ov(c1, c6, c3)
}

blocks.name: imsdval2
blocks.content: Value of the distance function of the induced metric of a normed complex vector space. Equation 1 of [Kreyszig] p. 59. (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm imsdval2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), cfv(c5, co(c1, c6, co(cneg(nat1), c7, c3)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cpv, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cns, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cims, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c1, c4, c3), cfv(c5, co(c1, c6, co(cneg(nat1), c7, c3))), cfv(c5, co(c1, cfv(cnsb, c0), c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  imsdval(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, cfv(cnsb, c0))
  fveq2d(c5, co(c1, cfv(cnsb, c0), c3), co(c1, c6, co(cneg(nat1), c7, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  nvmval(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cnsb, c0), c6, c7)
  eqid(cfv(cnsb, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm imsdval2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c4]c3)=(c5 `(c1[c6](-u(1)[c7]c3))))
  ⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(+v ` c0)
  ⊣ c7 =(.sOLD ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(normCV ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(IndMet ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c1[c4]c3), (c5 `(c1[c6](-u(1)[c7]c3))), (c5 `(c1[(-v ` c0)]c3)), (c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  imsdval(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, (-v ` c0))
  fveq2d(c5, (c1[(-v ` c0)]c3), (c1[c6](-u(1)[c7]c3)), (c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  nvmval(c0, c1, c2, c3, (-v ` c0), c6, c7)
  eqid((-v ` c0))
}

blocks.name: nvnd
blocks.content: The norm of a normed complex vector space expressed in terms of the distance function of its induced metric. Problem 1 of [Kreyszig] p. 63. (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nvnd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, c1), co(c1, c4, c5)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cn0v, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cims, c0))
} = {
  eqtr2d(cfv(c3, c1), co(c1, c4, c5), cfv(c3, co(c1, cfv(cnsb, c0), c5)), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)))
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, c4, c5), cfv(c3, co(c1, cfv(cnsb, c0), c5))), wcel(c5, c2))
  imsdval(c0, c1, c2, c5, c4, c3, cfv(cnsb, c0))
  fveq2d(c3, co(c1, cfv(cnsb, c0), c5), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)))
  3eqtrd(co(c1, cfv(cnsb, c0), c5), c1, co(c1, cfv(cpv, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c5)), co(c1, cfv(cpv, c0), c5), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)))
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cnsb, c0), c5), co(c1, cfv(cpv, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c5))), wcel(c5, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  nvzcl(c0, c5, c2)
  nvmval(c0, c1, c2, c5, cfv(cnsb, c0), cfv(cpv, c0), cfv(cns, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cnsb, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cpv, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c5)), co(c1, cfv(cpv, c0), c5)))
  oveq2d(c1, cfv(cpv, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c5), c5, wcel(c0, cnv))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cnv), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c5), c5), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  neg1cn()
  nvsz(c0, cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c5)
  eqid(cfv(cns, c0))
  nv0rid(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cpv, c0), c5)
  eqid(cfv(cpv, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nvnd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c3 ` c1)=(c1[c4]c5))
  ⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(0vec ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(normCV ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(IndMet ` c0)
} = {
  eqtr2d((c3 ` c1), (c1[c4]c5), (c3 `(c1[(-v ` c0)]c5)), (c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  mpd3an3(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈ c2, (c1[c4]c5)=(c3 `(c1[(-v ` c0)]c5)), c5 ∈ c2)
  imsdval(c0, c1, c2, c5, c4, c3, (-v ` c0))
  fveq2d(c3, (c1[(-v ` c0)]c5), c1, (c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  3eqtrd((c1[(-v ` c0)]c5), c1, (c1[(+v ` c0)](-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c5)), (c1[(+v ` c0)]c5), (c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  mpd3an3(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈ c2, (c1[(-v ` c0)]c5)=(c1[(+v ` c0)](-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c5)), c5 ∈ c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈ c2, c5 ∈ c2)
  nvzcl(c0, c5, c2)
  nvmval(c0, c1, c2, c5, (-v ` c0), (+v ` c0), (.sOLD ` c0))
  eqid((-v ` c0))
  adantr(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈ c2, (c1[(+v ` c0)](-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c5))=(c1[(+v ` c0)]c5))
  oveq2d(c1, (+v ` c0), (-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c5), c5, c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
  mpan2(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, (-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c5)= c5, -u(1)∈ ℂ)
  neg1cn()
  nvsz(c0, -u(1), (.sOLD ` c0), c5)
  eqid((.sOLD ` c0))
  nv0rid(c0, c1, c2, (+v ` c0), c5)
  eqid((+v ` c0))
}

blocks.name: imsdf
blocks.content: Mapping for the induced metric distance function of a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 29-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm imsdf(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wf(c1, cxp(c2, c2), cr))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cims, c0))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cnv), wf(c1, cxp(c2, c2), cr), wf(ccom(cfv(cnmcv, c0), cfv(cnsb, c0)), cxp(c2, c2), cr))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cnv), wf(ccom(cfv(cnmcv, c0), cfv(cnsb, c0)), cxp(c2, c2), cr), wf(cfv(cnmcv, c0), c2, cr), wf(cfv(cnsb, c0), cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  nvf(c0, cfv(cnmcv, c0), c2)
  nvmf(c0, cfv(cnsb, c0), c2)
  fco(cfv(cnmcv, c0), c2, cr, cfv(cnsb, c0), cxp(c2, c2))
  feq1d(c1, cxp(c2, c2), cr, ccom(cfv(cnmcv, c0), cfv(cnsb, c0)), wcel(c0, cnv))
  imsval(c0, c1, cfv(cnmcv, c0), cfv(cnsb, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cnsb, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cnmcv, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm imsdf(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec →(c1 :(c2 × c2)→ ℝ))
  ⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(IndMet ` c0)
} = {
  mpbird(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, (c1 :(c2 × c2)→ ℝ), (((normCV ` c0)∘(-v ` c0)):(c2 × c2)→ ℝ))
  syl2anc(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, (((normCV ` c0)∘(-v ` c0)):(c2 × c2)→ ℝ), ((normCV ` c0): c2 → ℝ), ((-v ` c0):(c2 × c2)→ c2))
  nvf(c0, (normCV ` c0), c2)
  nvmf(c0, (-v ` c0), c2)
  fco((normCV ` c0), c2, cr, (-v ` c0), (c2 × c2))
  feq1d(c1, (c2 × c2), cr, ((normCV ` c0)∘(-v ` c0)), c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
  imsval(c0, c1, (normCV ` c0), (-v ` c0))
  eqid((-v ` c0))
  eqid((normCV ` c0))
}

blocks.name: imsmetlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ imsmet . (Contributed by NM, 29-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm imsmetlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cba, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpv, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cgn, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cns, c2))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cn0v, c2))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cnmcv, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cims, c2))
  -| wcel(c2, cnv)
} = {
  a1ii(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wceq(c4, cfv(cgn, c3)))
  ismeti(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1)
  fvexi(c1, cba, c2)
  ax-mp(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cr), wcel(c2, cnv))
  imsdf(c2, c0, c1)
  3bitrd(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(c7, co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1)))), nat0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1))), c6))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat0, cfv(c7, co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wb(wceq(cfv(c7, co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1)))), nat0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1))), c6)), wcel(c2, cnv), wcel(co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1))), c1))
  nvz(c2, co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1))), c1, c7, c6)
  bitr3d(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1))), c6), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1))), c3, cv(hs1)), co(c6, c3, cv(hs1))))
  sylancom(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wb(wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1))), c3, cv(hs1)), co(c6, c3, cv(hs1))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1))), c6)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1))), c1))
  sylan2(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1))), c1), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1)), c1))
  mp3an1(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1)), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1))), c1), wcel(c2, cnv))
  nvgcl(c2, cv(hs0), c1, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1)), c3)
  mp3an2(wcel(co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1))), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wb(wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1))), c3, cv(hs1)), co(c6, c3, cv(hs1))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c5, cv(hs1))), c6)), wcel(c6, c1))
  ax-mp(wcel(c6, c1), wcel(c2, cnv))
  nvzcl(c2, c6, c1)

blocks.name: imsmet
blocks.content: The induced metric of a normed complex vector space is a metric space. Part of Definition 2.2-1 of [Kreyszig] p. 58. (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm imsmet(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cims, c0))
} = {
  syl5eqel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2), cfv(cims, c0), wcel(c0, cnv))
  dedth(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cfv(cims, c0), cfv(cmet, c2)), wcel(cfv(cims, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))), cfv(cmet, cfv(cba, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))))))
  eleq12d(cfv(cims, c0), cfv(cmet, c2), cfv(cims, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))), cfv(cmet, cfv(cba, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv)))), wceq(c0, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))))
  fveq2(c0, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv)), cims)
  fveq2d(cmet, c2, cfv(cba, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))), wceq(c0, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))))
  syl5eq(c2, cfv(cba, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))), cfv(cba, c0), wceq(c0, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))))
  fveq2(c0, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv)), cba)
  imsmetlem(cfv(cims, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))), cfv(cba, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))), cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv)), cfv(cpv, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))), cfv(cgn, cfv(cpv, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv)))), cfv(cns, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))), cfv(cn0v, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))), cfv(cnmcv, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))))
  eqid(cfv(cba, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))))
  eqid(cfv(cpv, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))))
  eqid(cfv(cgn, cfv(cpv, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv)))))
  eqid(cfv(cns, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))))
  eqid(cfv(cn0v, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))))
  eqid(cfv(cnmcv, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))))
  eqid(cfv(cims, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv))))

  eleq12d((IndMet ` c0), (Met ` c2), (IndMet ` if(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c0, < < +, × >, abs >)), (Met `(BaseSet ` if(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c0, < < +, × >, abs >))), c0 = if(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c0, < < +, × >, abs >))

  fveq2d(cmet, c2, (BaseSet ` if(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c0, < < +, × >, abs >)), c0 = if(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c0, < < +, × >, abs >))

blocks.name: imsxmet
blocks.content: The induced metric of a normed complex vector space is an extended metric space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: cnims
blocks.content: The metric induced on the complex numbers. ~ cnmet proves that it is a metric. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 5-Dec-2006.) (Revised by NM, 15-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: vacn
blocks.content: Vector addition is jointly continuous in both arguments. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 16-Jun-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm nmcnc(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))

} = {

  tgioo2(c3)
